long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pixel Pets are a cute addition to your web browser! Let these smol fur friends roam around your screen to keep you focused while you browse. Find happiness in knowing your little critter is right beside you :)
